Experiences

I (co-)create experiences, spaces and events where magic happens.

üåÄ

Gatherings, immersive performances, cohort based courses, parties, exhibitions, sailing trips, sharing circles, workshops, trainings, retreats, weddings ‚Ä¶ you name it.

My personal ikigai is to bring people together and hold space for relational transformation. Relational = in relationship with other people and the world around us.

üå≥

It all started with my mother bringing me to a winter retreat of a theatre group at the age of one (thank you mum!), which escalated into a Film and Media degree, and numerous exhibitions, performances, and art experiences.

In parallel, at the age of eighteen I started organising events and facilitating teams on international exchanges and European Youth Parliament sessions. Since then, I‚Äôve been practicing the future of work by co-creating within Enspiral, Traditional Dream Factory, Honeyboom, Lethally Harmless Productions and other wonderful projects and organisations. I‚Äôm a microsolidarity community weaver and catalyst in Pico Island (which is my home for most of the year), working towards Azores Regenerative Network. I‚Äôm also: a certified habit coach -> dream big, start small, make it happen.

I‚Äôm a big fan of learning by doing and my professional curiosity lies in integrating transformational experiences: how to carry forward the energy and insight from a transformational experience, after it‚Äôs over?

‚òÄÔ∏è

My work is inspired by heart-to-heart connections, nature and playfulness. I love contact improvisation, hiking for hours, building structures from wood, seeing a spark of joy in someones eyes, and sailing at night under star-covered sky. These moments of awe make me feel alive and fuel my aspiration:

Let‚Äôs co-create a beautiful world where all Beings can thrive.

Thank you for Being ‚ú®
Micha≈Ç
